item.title: Uma Racing Codes (November 2025)
item.content:encoded:
Use these Roblox Uma Racing monthly redeem codes for November 2025 to get your hands on plenty of free rewards, including Cash and plenty more.

For magnificent victories in Uma Racing, you’ll not only need to master the track art but also use the finest Umas. Umas are special abilities that are infamous for changing the tables of any losing race. Many will grind for hours to save money to purchase Umas, while the rest go all-out with Robux. You can stand out by redeeming the active codes and avoiding the initial grinding phase. Simply redeem these active codes to fill your in-game wallet with lots of money. Lead the charge from the start to the end by redeeming the featured codes in this Roblox experience.

Active Uma Racing Codes

  • IOOKMEMBERS – 3000$ (New)
  • FIFTYTHOUSANDLIKES – 3000$
  • THANKFORSUPPORTIN – 4500$
  • RELEASECUH – 1500$
  • MBFORANOTHERDELAYBRO – 2500$
  • UFFUEWANTTOMATO – 1000$
  • FIRSTBUGFIX – 1500$

Inactive Uma Racing Codes

CINDERELLAGRAY||PLAYTEST||DELAYMBBRO||SORRYFORBUG

How To Redeem Uma Racing Codes? 

Before you launch Uma Racing to redeem the active codes, join the game’s official Roblox group. To do so, follow these steps: 

  1. Search for Uma Racing and open its homepage.
  2. Scroll down to find the “Developer” tab and select it. 
  3. Choose the blue “Join Community” to join the official Roblox group. 

After this, follow these instructions to redeem the active codes: 

  1. Start Uma Racing and select the “MENU” button. 
  2. Press the “Codes” button on the right side to open the code box. 
  3. Copy any active code and paste it into the “ENTER CODE” box. 
  4. Finish the redemption process by clicking the “REDEEM” button. 

More About Uma Racing Codes

The free money earned from the active codes in Uma Racing can be spent on various Products. Notably, Umas, special styles that can be used to increase your chances of winning and improve your performance on the track. Here are all the Umas, their chances, and price:

  • Umas- 250$
  • Common – 55% – Haru Urara
  • Uncommon – 30% – Air Groove 
  • Rare – 13.5% – Dalwe Scarlet and Gold Ship 
  • Legendary – 1.5% – Silence Suzuka, Rice Shower, Tamamo Cross, and Oguri Cap 

Other Products include the following: 

  • Emotes – Grab random Emotes – 250$
  • MVPs – Get MVP and show off to the crowd – 125,00$
  • Name Tags – Show off your unique name tag in the chat – 2500$
  • Openings – Warm up before starting the race – 2500$

FAQs on Uma Racing codes

What are the latest active codes?

“IOOKMEMBERS” is the only latest active code. 

What code can be redeemed for the maximum amount of money?

“THANKFORSUPPORTIN” is the only latest active code. 

When will the active codes expire?

The active codes are speculated to turn inactive right after a new in-game update drops.

Having fun using codes in Roblox games? Then check out the latest codes for 99 Nights in the Forest, Type Soul, and Azure Latch. Also, check out the Insider Gaming Discord server.
